sentences.en: A strategist at a local trade association predicts that " 2011 - 12 will be carnage year. "
sentences.cn: 在当地行业协会的战略家预言道: “ 2011-12年度 将是的屠杀之年. ”

sentences.en: Andy Rothman, China strategist at CLSA, says people should not get hung up on that comparison.
sentences.cn: 里昂证券(CLSA)中国策略师安迪?罗斯曼(AndyRothman)表示,大家不用对这种对比感到忧心.

sentences.en: As a politician Mr Ch á vez is a cool strategist, though a sometimes reckless tactician.
sentences.cn: 身为政治家的查韦斯先生是一位非常冷静的战略家, 尽管有时也是一位不计后果的战术家.

sentences.en: Can say that can write incorrect, that an armchair strategist.
sentences.cn: 能说能写还是不行的, 那是纸上谈兵.

sentences.en: Charlie was a street fighter and a strategist, always thinking ahead what he could do next.
sentences.cn: 查利是个巷战能手,是个战略家, 他永远先想好下一步怎么办.

sentences.en: He deserves better, for he's a great strategist.
sentences.cn: 他理应获得更大的成就, 因为他是个伟大的战略家.

sentences.en: He is also sought after as a strategist.
sentences.cn: 他也被公认为一位策略家.

sentences.en: He is more of a strategist than of a tactician.
sentences.cn: (他与其说是个战术家,不如说是个战略家. )

sentences.en: He serves as Microsoft's chief strategist and oversees product development.
sentences.cn: 他是微软的首席战略决策者,并负责微软的海外产品开发.

sentences.en: He's the president's chief political strategist.
sentences.cn: 他是总统主要的政治战略家.

sentences.cn: 信达证券首席策略分析师黄祥斌说.

sentences.en: Military strategists had devised a plan that guaranteed a series of stunning victories.
sentences.cn: 军事战略家们设计了一个保证了一系列惊人胜利的计划。
我们的技术主管和战略家.

sentences.en: Scorpio is a master strategist and can help Libra focus their occasionally scattered or indecisive minds.
sentences.cn: 蝎是战略家,可以帮助秤应对偶尔出现的犹豫不决.

sentences.en: She is a key strategist in the campaign against terrorism.
sentences.cn: 她是反恐行动的一位关键的战略者.

sentences.en: To my chief strategist, David Axelrod , who a partner with me every step of the way.
sentences.cn: 感谢我的首席策略师大卫·艾克斯罗德, 他同我一路走来.

trans.tran_en: someone who is good at planning things, especially military or political actions
